Uhhh...That's more moding, TheCode.  Number One, Stinkbomb and Ramhorn are 
BOTH INSIDE the ARK'S BRIDGE.  Secondly, the weapon was merely millimeters 
from Suukie's gut.  Unless Suukie is the flash, he's hit.  Sorry.  It 
wouldn't even be a one and a half seconds before the first shot would dig 
into Suukie's stomach.
